about_the_game:
Partizan is a brutal action-oriented, retro-inspired immersive sim set in a brutalist future governed by an authoritarian regime. You take on the role of a single member of the expanding rebel movement in an attempt to overthrow totalitarian and corrupt leaders. You quickly find that a lot stands in your path, from small militias to an infection that turns people into homicidal maniacs.

Partizan has an emphasis on player freedom and expression, with a variety of approaches to levels and combat. You can perform a range of movements such as diving, kicking, and sliding at any time, allowing the user to play as methodically or as action-packed as they like.

To get an advantage over your opponent, use player abilities such as slow-motion and other augments. Explore a range of abilities and combine them to build your own play style.

During heated firefights, Partizan encourages creativity and split-second decision making; without your brains, you won't be able to fight to your full potential.

Use the combat sandbox to your advantage, finding weaknesses in the environment by throwing exploding barrels or releasing an infection that leads to infighting. You can fight and win full battles merely by using your surroundings.

Approach levels as you see fit with numerous immersive sim features.

Will you slip past without alerting anyone?



OR go all out with guns blazing and massacre everyone?



OR will you take advantage of the surroundings by infecting your foes and turning them against each other?



The choice is yours. Open ended level design allows you to play how you want to and become the ultimate rebel fighter in your own way.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features intense combat scenes where players engage in battles. These encounters often result in graphic representations of combat, including injuries, blood and dismemberment.

name: Partizan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Partizan is a brutal and satisfying action-oriented immersive sim set in a brutalist dystopia ruled by a oppressive regime. Rip and tear through militias, bureaucrats and gunked up quarantine zones until the world knows your name.
